sn51.19:1: "Iddhiṁ vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi iddhi pāda ñca iddhi pāda bhāvanañca iddhi pāda bhāvanāgāminiñca paṭipadāṁ. Taṁ suṇātha.
sn51.19:2: Katamā ca, bhikkhave, iddhi? Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu anekavihitaṁ iddhividhaṁ paccanubhoti – ekopi hutvā bahudhā hoti, bahudhāpi hutvā eko hoti … pe … yāva brahmalokāpi kāyena vasaṁ vatteti – ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, iddhi.
sn51.19:3: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, iddhipādo? Yo so, bhikkhave, maggo yā paṭipadā iddhilābhāya iddhipaṭilābhāya saṁvattati – ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, iddhipādo.
sn51.19:4: Katamā ca, bhikkhave, iddhi pāda bhāvanā? Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu chandasamādhippadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṁ iddhi pāda ṁ bhāveti, vīriyasamādhi … pe … cittasamādhi … vīmaṁsāsamādhippadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṁ iddhi pāda ṁ bhāveti – ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, iddhi pāda bhāvanā.
sn51.19:5: Katamā ca, bhikkhave, iddhi pāda bhāvanāgāminī paṭipadā? Ayameva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo, seyyathidaṁ – sammādiṭṭhi, sammāsaṅkappo, sammāvācā, sammākammanto, sammāājīvo, sammāvāyāmo, sammāsati, sammāsamādhi – ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, iddhi pāda bhāvanāgāminī paṭipadā"ti.
